Class RecipientLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.RecipientLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecipientLineInterface

    public class RecipientLine
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecipientLineInterface
    Simulates a line of recipients.
    Author:
    Marcus Brooks

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RecipientLine()
      Default constructor which initializes the recipient line with the default capacity
      RecipientLine(int size)
      Parameterized constructor which initializes the recipient line with a custom capacity
